economy_survey_sloos_fred_obb.name: Economy Survey SLOOS (fred) (OpenBB Platform API)
economy_survey_sloos_fred_obb.description: Get Senior Loan Officers Opinion Survey.

params.label: Start Date
params.description: Start date of the data, in YYYY-MM-DD format.

params.label: End Date
params.description: End date of the data, in YYYY-MM-DD format.

params.label: Category
params.description: Category of survey response.

params.label: Transform
params.description:
Transformation type
            None = No transformation
            chg = Change
            ch1 = Change from Year Ago
            pch = Percent Change
            pc1 = Percent Change from Year Ago
            pca = Compounded Annual Rate of Change
            cch = Continuously Compounded Rate of Change
            cca = Continuously Compounded Annual Rate of Change
            log = Natural Log

    log = Natural Log

economy_cpi_fred_obb.name: Economy CPI (fred) (OpenBB Platform API)
economy_cpi_fred_obb.description:
Get Consumer Price Index (CPI).

Returns either the rescaled index value, or a rate of change (inflation).

params.label: Country
params.description: The country to get data. Multiple comma separated items allowed.

params.label: Transform
params.description: Transformation of the CPI data. Period represents the change since previous. Defaults to change from one year ago (yoy).

params.label: Frequency
params.description: The frequency of the data.

params.label: Harmonized
params.description: If true, returns harmonized data.

params.label: Start Date
params.description: Start date of the data, in YYYY-MM-DD format.

params.label: End Date
params.description: End date of the data, in YYYY-MM-DD format.

economy_balance_of_payments_fred_obb.name: Economy Balance Of Payments (fred) (OpenBB Platform API)

params.label: Country
params.description: The country to get data. Enter as a 3-letter ISO country code, default is USA.

params.label: Start Date
params.description: Start date of the data, in YYYY-MM-DD format.

params.label: End Date
params.description: End date of the data, in YYYY-MM-DD format.

economy_fred_search_fred_obb.name: Economy FRED Search (fred) (OpenBB Platform API)
economy_fred_search_fred_obb.description:
Search for FRED series or economic releases by ID or string.

This does not return the observation values, only the metadata.
Use this function to find series IDs for `fred_series()`.

params.label: Query
params.description: The search word(s).

params.label: Is Release
params.description: Is release?  If True, other search filter variables are ignored. If no query text or release_id is supplied, this defaults to True.

params.label: Release ID
params.description: A specific release ID to target.

params.label: Limit
params.description: The number of data entries to return. (1-1000)

params.label: Offset
params.description: Offset the results in conjunction with limit.

params.label: Filter Variable
params.description: Filter by an attribute.

params.label: Filter Value
params.description: String value to filter the variable by.  Used in conjunction with filter_variable.

params.label: Tag Names
params.description: A semicolon delimited list of tag names that series match all of.  Example: 'japan;imports' Multiple comma separated items allowed.

params.label: Exclude Tag Names
params.description: A semicolon delimited list of tag names that series match none of.  Example: 'imports;services'. Requires that variable tag_names also be set to limit the number of matching series. Multiple comma separated items allowed.

params.label: Series ID
params.description: A FRED Series ID to return series group information for. This returns the required information to query for regional data. Not all series that are in FRED have geographical data. Entering a value for series_id will override all other parameters. Multiple series_ids can be separated by commas.

economy_fred_series_fred_obb.name: Economy FRED Series (fred) (OpenBB Platform API)
economy_fred_series_fred_obb.description: Get data by series ID from FRED.

params.label: Symbol
params.description: Symbol to get data for. Multiple comma separated items allowed.

params.label: Start Date
params.description: Start date of the data, in YYYY-MM-DD format.

params.label: End Date
params.description: End date of the data, in YYYY-MM-DD format.

params.label: Limit
params.description: The number of data entries to return.

params.label: Frequency
params.description:
Frequency aggregation to convert high frequency data to lower frequency.
        
    None = No change
        
    a = Annual
        
    q = Quarterly
        
    m = Monthly
        
    w = Weekly
        
    d = Daily
        
    wef = Weekly, Ending Friday
        
    weth = Weekly, Ending Thursday
        
    wew = Weekly, Ending Wednesday
        
    wetu = Weekly, Ending Tuesday
        
    wem = Weekly, Ending Monday
        
    wesu = Weekly, Ending Sunday
        
    wesa = Weekly, Ending Saturday
        
    bwew = Biweekly, Ending Wednesday
        
    bwem = Biweekly, Ending Monday

params.label: Aggregation Method
params.description:
A key that indicates the aggregation method used for frequency aggregation.
        This parameter has no affect if the frequency parameter is not set.
        
    avg = Average
        
    sum = Sum
        
    eop = End of Period

params.label: Transform
params.description:
Transformation type
        
    None = No transformation
        
    chg = Change
        
    ch1 = Change from Year Ago
        
    pch = Percent Change
        
    pc1 = Percent Change from Year Ago
        
    pca = Compounded Annual Rate of Change
        
    cch = Continuously Compounded Rate of Change
        
    cca = Continuously Compounded Annual Rate of Change
        
    log = Natural Log

economy_fred_release_table_fred_obb.name: Economy FRED Release Table (fred) (OpenBB Platform API)
economy_fred_release_table_fred_obb.description: Get economic release data by ID and/or element from FRED.

params.label: Release ID
params.description: The ID of the release. Use `fred_search` to find releases.

params.label: Element Id
params.description: The element ID of a specific table in the release.

params.label: Date
params.description: A specific date to get data for. Multiple comma separated items allowed.

economy_fred_regional_fred_obb.name: Economy FRED Regional (fred) (OpenBB Platform API)
economy_fred_regional_fred_obb.description:
Query the Geo Fred API for regional economic data by series group.

The series group ID is found by using `fred_search` and the `series_id` parameter.

params.label: Symbol
params.description: Symbol to get data for.

params.label: Start Date
params.description: Start date of the data, in YYYY-MM-DD format.

params.label: End Date
params.description: End date of the data, in YYYY-MM-DD format.

params.label: Limit
params.description: The number of data entries to return.

params.label: Is Series Group
params.description: When True, the symbol provided is for a series_group, else it is for a series ID.

params.label: Region Type
params.description: The type of regional data. Parameter is only valid when `is_series_group` is True.

params.label: Season
params.description: The seasonal adjustments to the data. Parameter is only valid when `is_series_group` is True.

params.label: Units
params.description: The units of the data. This should match the units returned from searching by series ID. An incorrect field will not necessarily return an error. Parameter is only valid when `is_series_group` is True.

params.label: Frequency
params.description:
Frequency aggregation to convert high frequency data to lower frequency.
        
    None = No change
        
    a = Annual
        
    q = Quarterly
        
    m = Monthly
        
    w = Weekly
        
    d = Daily
        
    wef = Weekly, Ending Friday
        
    weth = Weekly, Ending Thursday
        
    wew = Weekly, Ending Wednesday
        
    wetu = Weekly, Ending Tuesday
        
    wem = Weekly, Ending Monday
        
    wesu = Weekly, Ending Sunday
        
    wesa = Weekly, Ending Saturday
        
    bwew = Biweekly, Ending Wednesday
        
    bwem = Biweekly, Ending Monday

params.label: Aggregation Method
params.description:
A key that indicates the aggregation method used for frequency aggregation.
        This parameter has no affect if the frequency parameter is not set.
        
    avg = Average
        
    sum = Sum
        
    eop = End of Period

params.label: Transform
params.description:
Transformation type
        
    None = No transformation
        
    chg = Change
        
    ch1 = Change from Year Ago
        
    pch = Percent Change
        
    pc1 = Percent Change from Year Ago
        
    pca = Compounded Annual Rate of Change
        
    cch = Continuously Compounded Rate of Change
        
    cca = Continuously Compounded Annual Rate of Change
        
    log = Natural Log
